text: Pentapanax castanopsidicola is a species of plant in the family Araliaceae. It is endemic to Taiwan. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * IUCN SSC China Plants Specialist Group 2004. Pentapanax castanopsidicola. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. title: Pentapanax castanopsisicola
